meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Lorraine Hirsch Andrew Duncan Richard Engel Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #1403.

td.p: Lorraine Hirsch, a lawyer from San Jose, California
Andrew Duncan, a therapist from Studio City, California
Richard Engel, a CPA and financial analyst from San Francisco, California (whose 1-day cash winnings total $9,900)

tr.td: LETTER PERFECT
ACTORS & THEIR ROLES
MYTHOLOGY
MUSIC CLASS
RABBITS
FICTIONAL CHARACTERS

Richard
Andrew
Lorraine
2nd place: trip on Delta to San Juan, Puerto Rico then to Nevis & stay at Resthaven Inn + The Jeopardy! Book
3rd place: Gibson food freezer & Nintendo Entertainment System with Family, Junior & Special editions of Jeopardy! & Wheel of Fortune + The Jeopardy! Book
New champion: $7,800
Richard
Andrew
Lorraine

2 W
(including 1 DD)
